param.name: inputrds
param.label: Input RDS
param.help: This is the output RData file given by the Cluster stage

section.name: projcell
section.title: Compute transcriptome entropy of each cell

param.name: knn
param.label: KNN
param.help: Number of nearest neighbours to consider.

param.name: cthr
param.label: Cluster Threshold
param.help: Clusters to be included in the StemID analysis must have more than this number of cells

param.name: nmode
param.label: Neighbour Mode
param.help: Assign a cell of a given cluster to the cluster with the smallest average distance of the knn nearest neighbours within this cluster.

param.name: fr
param.label: F-R layout?
param.help: Use Fruchterman-Rheigold layout instead of t-SNE

section.name: projback
section.title: Compute Cell Projections for Randomized Background Distribution

param.name: pdishuf
param.label: Shuffle Projections
param.help: Number of randomizations of cell positions for which to compute projections of cells on inter-cluster links

param.name: fast
param.label: Use a fast approximate background model to infer links

param.name: pthr
param.label: P-value cutoff
param.help: Cutoff for link significance. This threshold is applied for the calculation of link scores reflecting how uniformly a link is occupied by cells.

param.name: sensitive
param.label: Sensitivity
param.help: All cells on the most highly significant link are and the link itself are disregard to test significance of the remaining links with a binomial p-value

param.name: showcells
param.label: Show Cells
param.help: Projections of cells are shown in the plot

param.name: scthr
param.label: Score Threshold
param.help: Score threshold for links to be shown in the graph

param.name: showtsne
param.label: Show tSNE
param.help: Show transparent t-SNE map of cells in the background

param.name: tp
param.label: Transparency
param.help: Level of transparency of t-SNE map

param.name: nn
param.label: Number of Neighbours
param.help: Number of higher order neighbours to be included for the determination of links

param.name: scthr
param.label: Score Threshold
param.help: Score threshold for links to be included in the calculation

macros.token:
#set ofc = $tool
in.rdat = readRDS('${ofc.inputrds}')
pstc.projc = formals(projcells) pstc.projc\$knn = as.integer( '$ofc.projcell.knn' ) pstc.projc\$cthr = as.integer( '$ofc.projcell.cthr' ) #if str($ofc.projcell.use.def) == "no": pstc.projc\$nmode = as.logical( '$ofc.projcell.use.nmode' ) pstc.projc\$fr = as.logical( '$ofc.projcell.use.fr' ) #end if
pstc.projb = formals(projback) pstc.projb\$pdishuf = as.integer( '$ofc.projback.pdishuf' ) #if str($ofc.projback.use.def) == "no": pstc.projb\$fast = as.logical( '$ofc.projback.use.fast' ) pstc.projb\$rseed = as.integer( '$ofc.projback.use.rseed' ) #end if
pstc.comppval = formals(comppvalue) pstc.comppval\$pthr = as.numeric( '$ofc.comppval.pthr' ) pstc.comppval\$sensitive = as.logical( '$ofc.comppval.sensitive' )
pstc.plotgraph = formals(plotgraph) pstc.plotgraph\$showCells = as.logical( '$ofc.plotgraph.showcells' ) pstc.plotgraph\$scthr = as.numeric( '$ofc.plotgraph.scthr' ) #if str($ofc.plotgraph.use.def) == "no": pstc.plotgraph\$showTsne = as.logical( '$ofc.plotgraph.use.showtsne' ) pstc.plotgraph\$tp = as.numeric( '$ofc.plotgraph.use.tp' ) #end if
pstc.compscore = formals(compscore) pstc.compscore\$nn = as.integer( '$ofc.compscore.nn' ) pstc.compscore\$scthr = as.numeric( '$ofc.compscore.scthr' )
out.pdf='${outpdf}' out.rdat='${outrdat}'
